DOC.brief_summary: The aim test serum level myokines associate protein energy wasting , inflammation atherosclerotic vascular disease among Taiwanese dialysis patient . Some novel myokines level , anthropometric parameter , cardiovascular risk factor , presence endothelial dysfunction examine 250 subject . The distribution recently identify myokines irisin , myotatin etc level study correlated marker malnutrition , endothelial dysfunction , inflammation insulin resistance . In present study , investigator follow investigate whether serum myokines level associate long-term mortality cause cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: Serum Level Myokines Protein Energy Wasting , Inflammation Atherosclerosis Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design Population In study , patient underwent stable hemodialysis least 3 month Tung Taichung Metroharbor Hospital enrol . Baseline clinical data age , sex , height , bodyweight , clinical etiology Chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) possible , comorbidities , blood pressure , laboratory measure [ serum creatinine , albumin , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , total cholesterol , complete blood count , urine routine , anthropometric information various potential indicator protein energy waste [ body mass index , waist/hip ratio , mid-arm circumference ( MAC ) , triceps skinfold thickness ( TSF ) , mid-arm muscle circumference ( MAMC ) , mid-arm muscle area ( MAMA ) , SGA , BIS analyse , dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DEXA ) , handgrip ( HG ) ] collect . For laboratory test , fast blood urine sample obtain patient perform mean routine method investigator hospital . All patient receive echocardiograms study perform within 3 month enrollment , use estimate congestive heart failure ( CHF , define ejection fraction < 50 % ) leave ventricular hypertrophy ( LVH , define left ventricle mass index > 125 g/m2 men 100 g/m2 woman ) .Cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) define previous history CHF , LVH , ischemic heart disease ( include prior history angina , myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft percutaneous cardiac catheter intervention ) cerebrovascular disease ( include prior history transient ischemic attack stroke ) . Information conventional clinical risk factor , smoking , diabetes mellitus , hypertension , medication necessary data baseline obtain standardize interview examination . The diagnosis type 2 diabetes make accord criterion American Diabetes Association . Patients malignant disease , acute infectious disease , inflammatory disease ( collagen disease ) , advance liver disease , take type immunosuppressive medication also exclude . Patients clinical manifestation atherosclerosis , congestive heart failure , history stroke , previous history coronary intervention coronary artery bypass graft surgery , presence peripheral vascular disease record . Anthropometrics , Handgrip Strength Body weight measure light clothe 0.1 kg . Height measure 0.1 cm . Waist circumference measure midpoint upper iliac lower costal level 0.1 cm end normal expiration . Hip circumference measure around large part hip . Anthropometric measurement obtain immediately HD session train researcher . Body mass index ( BMI ) calculate body mass divide stature square . The International Society Renal Nutrition Metabolism ( ISRNM ) panel recommend BMI low 23 kg/m2 marker Protein Energy Wasting ( PEW ) . Anthropometric measurement include TSF use skinfold caliper ; MAC measure stretchable measuring tape , MAMC equal MAC ( centimeter ) - 3.14 x TSF ( millimeter ) /10 MAMA equal ( MAMC2/4π ) . Muscle mass area ( MMA ) calculate use follow equation : MMA = ( [ MAC { cm } - π x triceps skinfold { cm } ] 2/4π ) -n , n = 10 men 6.5 woman . Muscle strength hand grip strength ( HGS ) test measure Hand Dynamometer . HGS measure 3 time leave right hand patient stand position use dynamometer unit kilogram . Patients hold dynamometer thigh level encourage squeeze instrument hard possible 3 s. The maximum grip strength among measurement use study . Three set measurement site average used analysis . Malnutrition Inflammation Score To assess malnutrition-inflammation complex syndrome ( MICS ) , also know Kalantar score , develop , validate Kalantar- Zadeh et al . measure baseline . The Malnutrition-Inflammation Score ( MIS ) ten component [ change end dialysis dry weight , dietary intake , gastrointestinal symptom , functional capacity , comorbidities , decrease fat store loss subcutaneous fat ( accord SGA ) , sign muscle wasting ( accord SGA ) , BMI , serum albumin , total iron binding capacity ] , four level severity , 0 ( normal ) 3 ( severely abnormal ) . The sum MIS component range 0 ( normal ) 30 ( severely malnourish ) , high score reflect great malnutrition inflammation severity . The comorbidity component score 0 comorbidities present ; 1 mild comorbidities present major comorbid condition ( MCCs ) absent ( New York Heart Association Class III IV congestive heart failure , severe coronary artery disease , acquire immunodeficiency syndrome , moderate- to-severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , metastatic malignancy ) ; 2 moderate comorbidities present , include one MCC ; 3 multiple severe comorbidities present , include two MCCs . Subjective global assessment ( SGAs ) perform experienced physician accord conventional SGA guideline . Dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry Whole-body scan perform accord manufacturer 's instruction , body fat , lean tissue mass ( LTM ) bone mineral content ( BMC ) analyse use manufacturer 's software . DEXA estimate fat-free mass ( FFM ) calculate sum LTM BMC estimate . All patient examine observer . Bioelectric impedance spectroscopy ( BIS ) BIS measurement perform participant enrol study specific member staff complete training course BIS technique , use portable whole body bioimpedance spectroscopy device , body composition monitor . The body composition monitor ( BCM ) measure impedance spectroscopy 50 different frequency 5 kilohertz ( kHz ) 1 megahertz ( MHz ) . Measurements take midweek dialysis session start hemodialysis treatment patient calm , supine , relaxed dialysis bed 10 minute . Specific exclusion criterion dictate device include history pacemaker , defibrillator , metallic suture , stent implantation amputation major limb . Biochemical Analysis Blood sample take nonfasting state midweek hemodialysis session . Complete blood count , creatinine , urea , albumin , transferrin , total carbon dioxide , hsCRP , triglyceride ( TG ) , total cholesterol ( TC ) , high-density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( HDL-C ) , low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( LDL-C ) , fast blood glucose measure routine laboratory method . Another blood sample store -80 degree centigrade subsequent assay item insulin , interleukin-6 , pentraxin , nitrotyrosine marker endothelial dysfunction Asymmetric dimethylarginine ( ADMA ) , adropin insulin resistance ( adiponectin , resistin leptin ) . Homeostatic Model Assessment Insulin Resistance ( HOMA-IR ) calculate fast insulin ( U/l ) × fast glucose ( mg/dl ) /405 , describe Matthews et al . Serum total p-cresol indoxyl sulfate ( i.e . combine free protein-bound fraction ) analyze High-performance liquid chromatography ( HPLC ) . Briefly , serum sample deproteinized determination indoxyl sulfate addition three part methanol one part serum . Total p-cresol ( i.e . combine free protein-bound fraction ) analyse deproteinization ( acid heat ) extraction ( ethyl acetate ) serum sample . Measurement serum myostatin , irisin myonectin Serum myostatin level measure competitive immunoassay kit accord manufacturer 's protocol . Serum irisin concentration measure use enzymelinked immunosorbent assay ) . The assay proven highly sensitive human irisin . Serum myonectin ( Circulating Complement-C1q Tumor necrosis factor ( TNF ) -Related Protein 15 ) Serum myonectin determine commercially available enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay kit .
DOC.criteria: Both sex age 2070 year . Received stable hemodialysis least 3 month . Written informed consent . Patients malignant disease , acute infectious disease , inflammatory disease ( collagen disease ) , advance liver disease , take type immunosuppressive medication exclude .
